attributes.action: Ban slow vehicles form using A roads during the morning and afternoon rush hour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Slow vehicles that use A roads during the morning and evening rush hours make commuting to and from work even more frustrating than it already is.  

If these vehicles waited 30 minutes or an hour before traveling, they would avoid the bulk of the traffic and reduce the delays on our already congested roads.
